content: pattern was also featured on knit & crochet today details are available by viewing the episode listing 1 show 113 edgings & filet crochet available as a free pdf by clicking here 2 gauge/gauge strip of frame= 3⁄4 /2cm wide using size 6 1 8mm hook and size 10 thread remember to check gauge for best results 1 http //knitandcrochetnow com/fly aspx layout=episodesindex&taxid=107 2 http //knitandcrochetnow com/downloadfly aspx download=productimages/113_lacycrochet_pattern pdf
